div.ab: " Onnophris, son of Petemounis, 12 dr.,;Horos, son of Pegkmounos, 16 dr.,;Hatres, son of Pateus, 4 dr.,;Theon, son of Hareotos, 4 dr.,;Mysthas, son of Hareotos, 4 dr.,;Penaus, son of Mysthes, 32 dr.,;Panetbeus, son of Papontos, 28 dr.,;560,;12th, Theon, son of Stratippos, 16 dr.,;Onnophris, son of Petearpsenesis, 8 dr.,;Herieus, son of Paos, 4 dr.,;Harphaesis, son of Onnophris, 8 dr.,;Hatres, son of Paos, 4 dr.,;Sambas, son of Keras, 4 dr. with the addition,;Herakles, son of Keras, 4 dr. with the addition,;Dioskous, son of Keras, 4 dr. with the addition,;Pollon, likewise, son of .ote(), 4 dr.,;Pollon, likewise, son, 4 dr.,;Panetbeus, son of Pithon, 8 dr.,;Hatres, likewise, 4 dr.,;Hatres, son of Didymos, 4 dr.,;Harphaesis, son of Arkous, 4 dr.,;[..].ph..s, son of Panetbeus, 16 dr.,;Mysthas, son of Heras, 20 dr.,;Panetbeus, son of Pnepheros, 36 dr.,;Panetbeus, son of Nekpheros, son of Kyl(), 36 dr.,;Panetbeus, son of Pnepheros, son of Pekre(), 8 dr.,;Phasis, son of Mysthes, 8 dr.,;Hesties, likewise, the younger, 20 dr.,;Hesties, likewise, 20 dr.,;Nemion, son of Isy.eou, 8 dr. with the addition,;Pak[.]s, son of Erieus the older, 16 dr.,;Peteus alias Nekpheros, son of Peus, 4 dr.,;Petys, son of Philargyrios, 8 dr.,;Peteuchos, son of Nekpheros the older, 4 dr. with the addition,;Melangkomas, son of Herakles, 4 dr. with the addition,;Sambas, likewise, son of Keotea(),;Pemphos, son of Sambas, 4 dr.,;Sambas, son of Herakles, son of Pnepheros, 8 dr.,;Petarmouthis aliasPsontonous, son of Smyr.(), 20 dr.,;Polys, son of Ischyrion, 12 dr.,;Kephalon, son of P...ios, 8 dr."
